Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory274.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: '...As a devotee, I merely wish to rectify any uncertainty of yours.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Your kindness, I worry, will destabilize the resolve of the Ascension-Network.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'The Network requires an agent of absolute power. Hesitancy and mercy are not the attributes of the devoted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'You once showed me its power, and that wave of pure strength shook me to my core. Since then, I have decided to follow you and offer myself to the work of the Network.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'But now, you concern me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Gabriel's words do not seem to displease Luna. Instead, there is a hint of a smirk on her face."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'So, tell me, how would you like to serve the Ascension-Network?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'The Red Tide is the manifestation of the volition from the Punishing Virus.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'They are exhibiting qualities of organic beings, which means... one day, Punishing Virus will be sentient. Like humans.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'All I am doing is further propelling this process and ensuring that, even when conscious, Hetero-Creatures will still be of use to us.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Several of these creatures slither by Gabriel's feet, gently nuzzling him, almost like they are trying to please him."}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'They are obedient. They will be even greater assets than the Corrupted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'With the Red Tide and these puppets, corruption will spread throughout the globe in no time. Once Babylonia is gone, nothing will be able to stop us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'That was why I proposed the first step of our plan—using Huaxu to assault the Gestalt, bringing down Babylonia by force.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: "Should Babylonia, the humans' last hope fall, we would be able to execute our plan much more swiftly. A shame, then...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "Huaxu... didn't disappoint, to a certain extent.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "It's because of Huaxu that I've obtained the secret behind the Inver-Device. To label that level of technology as highly-classified... Humans are so absurd sometimes.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: "Huaxu's failure has not been unexpected. I have never put my faith in an outsider, which is why I have prepared an alternative.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Is that what you've been hiding underneath the Core Area?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: '...Of course, nothing escapes Miss Luna.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Gabriel, you aren't skilled enough to hide things from me yet.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I don't care how you do it. I only want results.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Behind Gabriel, his hand briefly twitches before closing resolutely.'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: '...My apologies, Miss Luna.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'But—before we continue, I must be certain of one thing.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Gabriel whispers his command, the Hetero-Creatures lurking by him suddenly launch toward Luna and strike.'}

{3: "Luna's minuscule figure is instantly swarmed by the frenzied crimson tide. Gabriel directs more monsters to attack her, then stands before the mad flood, like an audience enjoying a performance."}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Please demonstrate to me with your action—that you are still the agent who holds absolute power.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "If you're in doubt, let me demonstrate my will.", 4: '1'}
